presets.name: SDXL-Character-Base
presets.style_prompt: studio-lit character render, sharp line art, balanced colors
presets.negative_prompt: lowres, blurry, watermark, text, cropped, extra limbs, worst quality

presets.name: SDXL-Illustrated-Hero
presets.style_prompt: dramatic comic book illustration, bold inks, cinematic lighting
presets.negative_prompt: washed out colors, messy anatomy, text, watermark, low contrast

presets.name: SDXL-Anime-Companion
presets.style_prompt: vibrant anime key art, clean cel shading, expressive pose
presets.negative_prompt: low detail, dull colors, watermark, signature, double face

presets.name: SDXL-Stylized-Mech
presets.style_prompt: detailed mecha render, crisp plating, dramatic rim light
presets.negative_prompt: rubber surfaces, blurred joints, watermark, disjointed limbs
